description: Build a fast, intuitive project management platform with issue tracking, sprint planning, and team collaboration - following Linear's performance-first and developer-focused approach.

frontend.rationale: Linear is famous for React-based performance optimization and smooth animations. TypeScript ensures data integrity in complex project hierarchies.

backend.rationale: GraphQL provides efficient data fetching for complex project relationships. Apollo Server offers excellent caching and subscription support.

database.rationale: PostgreSQL for relational project data with excellent JSON support. Redis for real-time updates and caching.

realtime.rationale: GraphQL subscriptions provide type-safe real-time updates. WebSocket for efficient real-time collaboration.

search.rationale: PostgreSQL full-text search for simplicity. Optional Elasticsearch for advanced search features and analytics.

integrations.rationale: RESTful API for external integrations. Webhooks for event-driven workflows. OAuth for secure third-party access.

questions.text: What project management methodology will you focus on?

choices.label: Agile/Scrum (sprints, story points, burndown)
choices.impact: Sprint planning, story point estimation, velocity tracking

choices.label: Kanban (continuous flow, WIP limits)
choices.impact: Workflow columns, WIP limits, cycle time tracking

choices.label: Hybrid approach (flexible methodologies)
choices.impact: Configurable workflows, multiple board views, custom fields

choices.label: Simple task management (to-do lists, basic tracking)
choices.impact: Basic task creation, simple status tracking, minimal complexity

questions.impact: Determines core workflow features, UI complexity, and target user base

questions.text: What team size will you primarily target?

choices.label: Small teams (2-10 members)
choices.impact: Simple permission model, basic reporting, focus on ease of use

choices.label: Medium teams (10-50 members)
choices.impact: Role-based permissions, advanced reporting, team hierarchy

choices.label: Enterprise teams (50+ members)
choices.impact: Complex permissions, advanced analytics, multi-project management

questions.impact: Affects permission system complexity, reporting features, and pricing model

questions.text: Will you focus specifically on software development teams (like Linear)?
questions.impact: Requires Git integration, code review workflows, deployment tracking, and developer-specific features

questions.text: How much customization will you offer?

choices.label: Minimal customization (Linear style - opinionated)
choices.impact: Simplified UI, faster development, consistent experience

choices.label: Moderate customization (custom fields, workflows)
choices.impact: Configurable workflows, custom fields, team preferences

choices.label: Extensive customization (Jira style)
choices.impact: Complex configuration system, workflow builder, custom UI

questions.impact: Determines UI complexity, development timeline, and maintenance overhead
Affects API development priority, integration marketplace, and feature complexity

metrics.usage: Daily active users, issues created/resolved, project velocity
metrics.engagement: Session duration, feature adoption, collaboration frequency
metrics.business: Seat growth, team retention, upgrade conversion
metrics.performance: Page load times, search speed, real-time update latency

risks.mitigation: Focus on specific niche, superior performance, unique workflow approach
Database optimization, caching strategies, pagination, virtual scrolling
Maintain opinionated design philosophy, user testing, progressive disclosure

risks.risk: User adoption and team migration challenges
risks.mitigation: Excellent onboarding, data import tools, migration assistance
Conflict resolution strategies, optimistic updates, proper error handling

successFactors: Strong keyboard shortcuts and power user features

competitorAnalysis.Asana: General project management, extensive features, team collaboration
competitorAnalysis.Monday.com: Visual project management, customizable workflows, enterprise focus

differentiationOpportunities: Better mobile experience for project management
